mapper.insert: INSERT INTO delivery_address (seq, address, storename, storephone, userid) VALUES (delivery_address_seq.nextval, #{address}, #{storename}, #{storephone}, #{userid})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM delivery_address WHERE seq = (SELECT MAX(seq) FROM delivery_address WHERE address = #{address} AND userid = #{userid})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wrap_store VALUES ((select nvl(max(seq), 0)+1 from wrap_store), (select storeregion from daminostoreinfo WHERE storename=#{storename}), #{storename}, (select storeaddress from daminostoreinfo WHERE storename=#{storename}), (select storephone from daminostoreinfo WHERE storename=#{storename}), #{userid})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM wrap_store WHERE seq = (SELECT MAX(seq) FROM wrap_store WHERE storename=#{storename} AND userid=#{userid})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_list (orderseq, userid, username, orderdate, deliverytime, address, tel, menus, price, take, store, paytool, paystatus, status, requirement) VALUES (#{orderdate}||LPAD(order_list_seq.nextval, 5, '0'), #{userid}, #{username}, to_date(#{orderdate}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), to_date(#{deliverytime}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{address}, #{tel}, #{menus}, #{price}, #{take}, #{store}, #{paytool}, #{paystatus}, #{status}, #{requirements})
